scripts.dev:desktop: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev -w @ethervault/app" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run dev -w @ethervault/electron"
scripts.build:ios: npm run cap:sync -w @ethervault/app && npm run cap:open:ios -w @ethervault/app
scripts.build:android: npm run cap:sync -w @ethervault/app && npm run cap:open:android -w @ethervault/app
scripts.dist:desktop: npm run build && npm run dist -w @ethervault/electron
scripts.postversion: npm run sync-version && git add packages/*/package.json
